TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputSubmit extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
type HtmlInputSubmit = class inherit HtmlInputButton interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，用于创建提交窗体的 Web 页面上的按钮控件。The class is derived from the class and is used to create a button control on a Web page that submits a form. 控件通常用于控件，将窗体控件重置为其初始值。The control is often used with the control, which resets form controls to their initial values. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用``以声明方式在 Web 窗体页的 HTML 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `` HTML control declaratively on a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1/CS/htmlinputcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1/VB/htmlinputvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在调用过程中以编程方式添加相同的 HTML 控件`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to add the same HTML control programmatically during a call to the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/CS/htmlinput2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/VB/htmlinput2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||"提交"的文本字符串。The "submit" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式添加， ，和控件添加到 Web 窗体使用默认构造函数创建一个简单的登录屏幕。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add , , and controls to a Web Forms page using default constructors to create a simple login screen. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/CS/htmlinput2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/VB/htmlinput2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`type` 参数的值。The value of the `type` parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式添加， ，和控件添加到 Web 窗体页来创建一个简单的登录屏幕。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add , , and controls to a Web Forms page to create a simple login screen. 此示例演示如何将各种不同的值传递`type`参数，这会重写 HTML 控件的内部类型。This example demonstrates how you can pass various values for the `type` parameter, which overrides the intrinsic type of the HTML control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_3/CS/htmlinput3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_3/VB/htmlinput3vb.aspx#1)]
